details.description: The 18th ACM SIGCHI Symposium on Engineering Interactive Computing Systems.

submission_information.review_process: Traditional journal model, may require resubmission.

technical_notes.description: Shorter, focused contributions specific to system contributions and technical work.
technical_notes.validation: Can be validated through various methods including simulation or comparisons.

topics: Modelling, specification and analysis of interaction and interactive systems
Methods, processes, principles and/or tools for building interactive systems
Formal methods within interactive systems engineering
Bridging the gap between engineering and design practices
Computational techniques for designing and evaluating interactive systems
Engineering hardware or software integration in interactive systems
Engineering interactive systems for diverse user groups
Applying AI technologies in methods, processes and tools for building interactive systems

submission_links.type: Full Papers and Technical Notes Submission
